document.full_text: democrat setti warren, mayor of newton, massachusetts, said on monday he will seek the democratic nomination to challenge republican senator scott brown in the 2012 election in massachusetts.
document.title: setti warren announces bid for massachusetts senate seat
lines_and_colors: democrat setti warren, mayor of newton, massachusetts, said on monday he will seek the democratic nomination to challenge republican senator scott brown in the 2012 election in massachusetts.
